About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

From the first time I wrote "Hello World" in HTML and it appeared in my browser I knew I was hooked. Programming hasn't just become a job for me. It opened up a world of opportunities in which I can grow and be challenged while improving my skills. What started with that simple "Hello world" turned into a full-flegded passion that only gets more exciting as time goes by. Please refer to the My Work page to see some of my projects.

Smooth On

Shipper

Accurately built pallets for outbound orders. Made sure all items and documentation complies with DOT and Hazmat Regulations. Operated Cherry Picker, Pallet Jack, Turret Truck, and Hand Jack safely and efficiently. Was able to identify and handle hazardous materials. Daily use of an application based WMS.

Lineage Logistics

Inventory Technician

Extensive use of WMS including but not limited to writing, typing, and entering information accurately. Kept back orders in sequence and released back orders when product became available. Performed cycle counts and audits based off picking errors. Located missing pallets or products based off history found using WMS. Placing or releasing products from hold statuses based off customer or warehouse needs.

United States Cold Storage

Warehouse Lead

Led warehouse improvement initiatives to advance operational efficiencies. Provided hands on leadership to the efficient coordination and execution of workflow throughout the warehouse, consistently keeping safety, sanitation, productivity, accuracy, team environment, and customer satisfaction in line with my shift and production goals. Extensive daily use of WMS.
